comments:
Description:
[Regression]Pop up an exception when set the default value in time parameter[0705]

Step:
1.New a report
2.New a parameter and set the type as time.
3.Input 00:00:00 to default value
4.Press OK

Actual result:
Pop up an exception

org.eclipse.birt.core.exception.CoreException: Can not convert the value of 01:00:00 to Date type.

Exception is thrown in parameter dialog. Assign GUI to investigate.
We should validate the value when user change the input and disable "ok" buttion as well as showing the error in message area.

In fact the value you input is valid, it should not throws any exception either.
Fixed.

traces.message: Can not convert the value of 01:00:00 to Date type.
